rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area serving as the main entrance and living space, featuring natural light from large windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with ample seating space for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional and modern design, includes storage and workspace. Vastu compliant placement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Features a private balcony for relaxation and views. Adheres to Mediterranean design with local building norms in mind.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A comfortable room designed for guests, with a spacious balcony that follows Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-lit and ventilated space attached to the guest room, ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Balcony (Common)
rooms.description: Shared balcony area connecting adjacent spaces for additional outdoor living.

openings.location: multiple, strategically placed for optimum daylight and adherence to Vastu principles

garage.description: Attached two-car garage with direct access to the house.

terrace.description: Spacious rooftop terrace for leisure and additional outdoor space, incorporating Mediterranean design elements.
